info.name: Facebook Clean  0.2.5
info.description:
Simple and clean Facebook style.  
NOTE: It's in development state right now. Visual Bugs may appear. I'm modifying the style daily, so stay tuned for more! 
If you have suggestions or find any kind of bugs, please write them down here.

THANK YOU for 200 Downloads!
info.additionalInfo: UBUNTU FONT - DOWNLOAD Version 0.2.5 - Removed border for "Places" in User Profile Page - Flat name and home button in header - Circle images for "Music" section in User Profile Page - Circle images for "Recent Activity" in User Profile Page - Fixed links images - Changed hashtag color in posts Version 0.2.3 - Changed background in Save page - Removed borders from Events page - Changed text color in sidebar - Fixed messages profile pictures Version 0.2.2 - Several visual fixes - Changed background in almost all pages (Some may still be with light grey background) - Text shadow removed in top line - Sidebar text color changed Version 0.2.1 - Quick Update - Top notifications - flat style - Several visual fixes Version 0.2 More styles added: - Profile page and Pages restyled - Added Ubuntu font! NOTE: You must add the font in your local system. Link at the top! - Chat restyled! - facebook chat ios 7 style by phoenixeo - All credits goes to him. - Several visual fixes! Version 0.1 Facebook Clean First Release. Some of the features: - White background - Colorful side notifications - Rounded profile pictures - Changed font color
